authors.author: Thomas Gossmann Extends IBaseLabelProvider with the methods to provide the text and/or image for each column of a given element. Used by table viewers.

method.name: ITableLabelProvider.getColumnText
method.description: Returns the label text for the given column of the given element.

param.name: element
param.description: the object representing the entire row, or null indicating that no input object is set in the viewer

param.name: columnIndex
param.description: the zero-based index of the column in which the label appears

method.return: String or or null if there is no text for the given object at columnIndex

method.name: ITableLabelProvider.getColumnImage
method.description: Returns the label image for the given column of the given element.

param.name: element
param.description: the object representing the entire row, or null indicating that no input object is set in the viewer

param.name: columnIndex
param.description: the zero-based index of the column in which the label appears

method.return: Image or null if there is no image for the given object at columnIndex
